entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
